name: Zoom-Attendee-Webhook
description: An AWS lambda which will act as a webhook for Zoom to track webinar attendees, and then surface an endpoint which allows tracking who is in a webinar.
author: Craig R. Hughes <craig.git@rungie.com>

scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Bump package version to $npm_package_version" package.json; git flow release start $npm_package_version; git flow release finish -m $npm_package_version $npm_package_version; git checkout develop; git merge master
